hero.title: Illuminating the digital world, one pixel at a time.

services.title: Services
services.videoDesc: Our video services include both standard and reel formats, delivering captivating visuals that highlight your brand across all platforms. Whether you need promotional content, behind-the-scenes footage, event videos, or short-form reels, we'll make sure every second counts.
services.photoDesc: We capture high-quality images that showcase your brand's unique style, from product shots to lifestyle photos that connect with your audience.
services.socialDesc: From copywriting and posting to ad management and graphic design, we handle every aspect of your social media. Monthly reports and analysis ensure your strategy stays effective.

clients.title: Happy Faces
clients.desc: Proudly presenting the clients who trust us with their needs.

ourWork.title: Our Work
ourWork.desc: Experience the power of our visual storytelling.

about.title: About Us
about.niksaTitle: Meet the maestro of our digital canvas
about.niksaDesc: Nikša Malić-Katanić, the Director of Photography who not only captures moments but also creates them.
about.andjaTitle: Say hello to the creative force of our digital team
about.andjaDesc: Anđela Andrić, who brings a vibrant and feminine touch to every project.

aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.niksaDesc: Together, they've crafted over a thousand digital stories, and they still argue about the best camera angles!
aboutUsPage.niksaDetails:
Nikša Malić-Katanić, the Director of Photography who not only captures moments but also creates them. Digital Artist - Graduated from the Department of Film. Camera, drone, edit - he masters them all.

With extensive experience as Director of Photography in both feature films and documentaries, Nikša brings a cinematic eye to every project.
aboutUsPage.andjaDetails:
Say hello to the creative force of our digital team, Anđela Andrić, who brings a vibrant and feminine touch to every project.

With years of expertise in film and digital media, Anđela's creative mind crafts unique visual narratives that captivate and engage audiences worldwide.

Anđela's exceptional communication skills allow her to truly understand client needs, bringing their visions to life with a unique, creative twist.

contact.title: Let's Capture Your Story
contact.desc: Boost your business with stunning photos and videos that grab attention and drive engagement.

contactUsPage.title: Contact Us
contactUsPage.subtitle: Our Contact Information
contactUsPage.desc: Write us an email with any of your questions regarding our services, previous work or anything that could spark a new collaboration project.
